title: Patch Failing and we're not sure why (ERROR code 004)
body:
i been playing league on my new laptop Lenovo Legion y520 and sudden this message occur while patching.
I tried almost everything i can think of which includes:
Uninstalling and Reinstalling
Hextech Repair Tool
Disabling all known firewall
Running as administrator
Turning my laptop off and on again (got mad after awhile)

However the message kept on occurring
idk if its due to the windows 10 update i had the day before this started occurring
Please help i havent played in weeks and i might get decayed
